Package server.request

package server.request
A package containing classes related to HTTP requests
Version:
1.0 - June 8th 2023
Author:
Harry Xu
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    server
    A package containing classes relating to the web server
    server.handler
    A package containing classes to handle HTTP requests and responses
    server.response
    A package containing classes related to HTTP responses
  • Class
    Description
    Request
    Represents an HTTP request to the server, to which the server responds to An HTTP requests consists of a status line, containing the protocol, request method, and url, the requests headers, and the requests body.
    Request.StatusLine
    Represents the status line of an HTTP requests, which is the first line in the request.
    RequestMethod
    Represents the possible requests methods of an HTTP request
